tasks.task: Gardening activities for onion and garlic care
subtasks: Identifying whether to top plants for garlic or onions
Allowing onions to continue growing naturally
Timing onions to be pulled on hot, dry, sunny days
Curing onions naturally by leaving stalks on after pulling
Cutting onion stalks about 1-2 inches above the bulb after curing
Storing onions separately, avoiding damaged or diseased ones
Monitoring storage duration based on variety (2-3 months or 1-2 weeks)
